Class OverlayItem

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.views.overlay.OverlayItem

public class OverlayItem
extends java.lang.Object

Immutable class describing a GeoPoint with a Title and a Description.

Author:
Nicolas Gramlich, Theodore Hong, Fred Eisele
